# pxc_pve_api_get (Data Source)

Makes a proxmox api get request via pvesh cli tool



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_path` (String) Cluster vars as yaml string

### Optional

- `get_args` (Map of String)
- `target_pve` (String)

### Read-Only

- `json_resp` (String) Proxmox api response in json --output format
